Air is the least of their worries.

So listen to me, fans of timestop porn. Did you know the Earth moves at roughly 1000mph at the equator? (The Earth does this thing where it spins you see) In addition to that, it revolves around the sun at about 67000mph. In addition to this, the universe is constantly expanding and everything inside the universe is moving away from the center at unimaginable speeds.

So we know that when time stops, only the user is unaffected. That means that the inertia of literally everything else in the universe halts. (Note that this is technically impossible because of the law of energy conservation). 

But assuming we say fuck physics and allow energy to simply vanish, we have but one problem- we have already decided that the user is unaffected by these motion stopping voodoo magicks. 
Conclusion: User rockets off into space at speeds possibly exceeding the speed of light.
Enough internet for today i guess

What a wild ride!

@definitionfinsanity It's probably a side effect. I mean think about it,the "devil" gave  them the timestop power so there has to be a catch somewhere. And it's not really a happy end. Yeah,it will be fun for them at the start but eventually this place where nothing changes will turn into living hell for them. And the devil said "I wonder what will happen to the world if the population keeps increasing at this rate"....sounds like he planned that from the start.

@masum_beast "but I don't get how the children became adults when time resumed?" - Because time DIDN'T resume. Time is stuck being frozen for them and their children. Hence why the seasons don't change and "no one can see them" (because the regular people are still frozen in time). The odd thing is that the kids are born instantly and age to adulthood but never a second beyond that - just like them. As for genetic defects... well... normal pregnancy doesn't happen in the span of 30 seconds, either. Nor does aging from an infant to adult in mere minutes. It's a hentai manga, fap - don't think.
